text: I ordered pepperoni and bacon, and sausage was also added to my pizza that I didn't order. We don't eat sausage due to health reasons, we had to pick them off. I had already made it home before realizing they added sausage!

text: We ordered two pizzas and it was theWorst experience in my life. Dough was soured and one pizza was overcooked and the other pizza  wasn't done in the middle. Asked to speak to the Manager and he acting like he was either overly exhausted ‚Ä¶More

text: If I could give this place 0 stars I would. I‚Äôve ordered from here before and it was great but this time it wasn‚Äôt. Disappointed with the pizza and this place. Never ordering again.

text: Always ready by the time I get to there to pick it up. Always friendly and of good quality.

name: Jeremy Bayone
text: Huge improvement now that this location is under new ownership. The managers seem to be on top of things and all the staff has been nice and friendly. Food was great and on time. One of the best Pizza Huts I've ordered from.

name: Ty Martin
text: Very deceptive when it comes to their lunch buffet pricing.  Other Pizza Huts that I have visited charge $5.99 for their lunch buffet.  I sat down and ordered a water with the buffet today.   At the end of the meal I was given a bill for ‚Ä¶More

name: Elaine Crocker
text: The place is neat and clean. The one-person wait staff is friendly and helpful.  The pizzas are abailable in a variety of crust styles and toppings are adequate.  The buffet is uninspired but very reasonably priced.

name: Justin Wilson
text: Nice service but when order was wrong they refused to correct it

name: C Willis
text: My pizza was great and so was the service

name: Brandon Rowell
text: The Pizza Hut has been redone.  The interior is crappy.  An entire back wall that is one long bench (a total waste).  The middle of the dining area felt so empty.  I started with a salad from the new salad bar.  I will not lie, my salads ‚Ä¶More

name: Kelly Brumbelow
text: Consistently one of the worst run franchise stores I have seen, and I used to be a manager for Yum foods so I have seen some run very poorly (usually right before we fired the crew and I went in to help train the replacements). This is a ‚Ä¶More

text: There is a buffet which is good and i love that but there really slow at bringing out the pizzas and when they do bring some out after waiting forever for it they bring out pizzas that nobody would ever eat service sucks here but other then that its clean and goid looking building

text: I just ordered a pizza for free cause a delivery driver gave him self a nice tip on my card the other day it's been refunded and they also gave me a free 2 liter,cookie,and breadsticks they make up for any mistakes

text: We were the only customers and every table was dirty. We walked to what looked like a clean table but quickly we see crumbs everywhere. Service and employees were nice but restaurant seemed wore out. Mens restroom had no water faucet.

text: The service wasnt that great. The tables had crumbs all over them. We went 30 mins after they opened for buffet and there were only 2 pizzas on the buffet the whole time. The salad bar has a very poor selection and the pizza looked and tasted like it had been reheated in the microwave and put out to serve! Never eating here again!

text: Pizza is not what it use to be.resturant was filthy. Chairs were dirty. Trash in floor. Service was ok but could be better..

text: The Cedartown Pizza Hut has been completely remodeled and it looks sooooo good inside and out.  The salad bar was fresh, there was a good variety of pizza on the lunch buffet.  The service was super with multiple drink refills.  We will definitely be back!

text: Was good, and you can request specific items for the food bar. Service seemed a bit lacking though.

name: Mike Linard
text: I don't know what happened we usually get this place often and always good. But this time was the most disgusting pizza I ever tried it was like little cesars..i know this isn't what we ordered.
